      • Mazub

        public Mazub(int pixelX,
             int pixelY,
             double actualX,
             double actualY,
             java.lang.String orientation,
             double horizontalVelocity,
             double minHorizontalVelocity,
             double maxHorizontalVelocity,
             double verticalVelocity,
             double horizontalAcceleration,
             double verticalAcceleration,
             boolean isJumpingMazub,
             double runtime,
             double standingStillTime,
             jumpingalien.util.Sprite currentSprite,
             jumpingalien.util.Sprite... sprites)
      throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Initialize this new Mazub with given actual position (x-coordinate and y-coordinate) and a given pixel position (pixelX and pixelY) .
        Parameters:
        pixelX - The pixelX in the gaming world for this new Mazub.
        pixelY - The pixelY in the gaming world for this new Mazub.
        actualX - The x-coordinate in the actual world for this new Mazub.
        actualY - The y-coordinate in the actual world for this new Mazub.
        orientation - The orientation for this new Mazub.
        horizontalVelocity - The horizontalVelocity for this new Mazub.
        minHorizontalVelocity - The minHorizontalVelocity for this new Mazub.
        maxHorizontalVelocity - The maxHorizontalVelocity for this new Mazub.
        verticalVelocity - The verticalVelocity for this new Mazub.
        horizontalAcceleration - The horizontalAcceleration for this new Mazub.
        verticalAcceleration - The verticalAcceleration for this new Mazub.
        isJumpingMazub - The isJumpingMazub for this new Mazub.
        sprites - The sprites for this new Mazub.
        currentSprite - The currentSprite for this new Mazub.
        runtime - The runtime for this new Mazub.
        standingStillTime - The standingStillTime for this new Mazub.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • Mazub

        public Mazub(int pixelX,
             int pixelY,
             jumpingalien.util.Sprite... sprites)
      throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Initialize this new Mazub with given pixel position.
        Parameters:
        pixelX - The x-coordinate of the pixel in the gaming world for the left bottom corner this new Mazub.
        pixelY - The y-coordinate of the pixel in the gaming world for the left bottom corner this new Mazub.
        sprites - The sprites for this new Mazub.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • isJumping

        public boolean isJumping()
        Check whether the given horizontalAcceleration is a valid horizontalAcceleration for any Mazub.
        Parameters:
        horizontalAcceleration - The horizontalAcceleration to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the horizontal acceleration is equal to either 0 or the movingAcceleration. | result == this.getHorizontalAcceleration() == 0 | | this.getHorizontalAcceleration() == movingAcceleration

      • startJump

        public void startJump()
               throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Start jumping the Mazub.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the Mazub is already jumping.

        Parameters:
        isJumpingMazub - The isJumpingMazub to check.
        Returns:

      • calculatePositionX

        public double calculatePositionX(double deltaT)
        Calculate the updated pixelX after a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        deltaT - The given time interval after which you have to update the pixelX
        Returns:
        The calculated position of pixelX starting from the current pixelX, the current horizontal velocity, the current horizontal acceleration and a given deltaT.

      • calculatePositionY

        public double calculatePositionY(double deltaT)
        Calculate the updated pixelY after a given time interval.
        Parameters:
        deltaT - The given time interval after which you have to update the pixelY
        Returns:
        The calculated position of pixelY starting from the current pixelY, the current vertical velocity, the current vertical acceleration and a given deltaT.

      • isValidRuntime

        public static boolean isValidRuntime(double runtime)
        Check whether the given runtime is a valid runtime for any Mazub.
        Parameters:
        runtime - The runtime to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if not below 0. | result == runtime >= 0
